meanings.definition: A cushion to support the head during sleep.
meanings.sent1: I love to fluff my pillows before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought new pillows for her bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The pillows on the couch looked like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: His words were a soft pillow for her troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The pillows in the hotel room were as soft as marshmallows.

meanings.definition: To rest (one's head) on or as on a pillow.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I just want to pillows on my cozy bed.
meanings.sent2: He pillows his head on her lap while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to pillows on the warm laundry pile.
meanings.sent4: The sun pillows on the horizon, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: She pillows her thoughts on the comforting memories of her childhood.
